Dear all, 

My name is Paolo Mura, I am a networker and strategy enthusiast looking for new opportunities in an international and stimulating environment. 

I always worked on projects that required community building and a constant focus on new trends, from underground to mainstream, which brought me to tour with one of the most successful artists in Italy and to develop my own music label. 

I'm also co-founder and creative director of Ecosistemi Festival since 2020, a post-internet oriented festival located on the Vesuvius Volcano in Naples.

I grew up in Italy but I've developed the capacity to build relationships with people from all over Europe and with very different backgrounds as I had to constantly adapt to new environments. 

Attached you can find my resume, please consider it for the Project Manager position, hope to hear from you soon.

Subject: Application for Project Manager at Polifonic Festival

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Project Manager position at Polifonic Festival. I am a networker and strategy enthusiast with a passion for community building and a constant focus on new trends.

I have extensive experience in project management, having worked on various projects that required creative and innovative solutions. My experience includes touring with one of the most successful artists in Italy and developing my own music label. I am also co-founder and creative director of Ecosistemi Festival, a post-internet oriented festival located on the Vesuvius Volcano in Naples, which has given me valuable experience in festival management.

I have the ability to build relationships with people from diverse backgrounds and have a proven track record of adapting to new environments. I have a strong network in the music and festival industry and am always seeking new opportunities in international and stimulating environments.

I have attached my resume for your review. Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss my qualifications further.

Sincerely,
Paolo Mura

Goal of Ecosistemi Festival: To become the leading festival in Italy dedicated to post-internet sub-cultures, combining avant-garde music, art, and the natural ecosystem.

Ecosistemi Festival aims to create an artistic and musical offering that is attuned to emerging sub-cultures and new generations, with an inclusive, international, and digitally-focused perspective. We will offer opportunities to young musical artists, from established names to niche communities that share an internet-based aesthetic.

We also want to enhance the offering of forms of aggregation and artistic expression, bringing the public closer to a vision of conscious use of natural spaces. Our goal is to consolidate the initiative as a reference point nationally and to strengthen our network at the European or international level.

The goal of Ecosistemi Festival is to create a unique experience for the audience that combines art, music, and nature, offering a fresh and innovative perspective on post-internet culture. We are looking for sponsors who share our vision and help us achieve this ambitious goal.

* Consolidates initiative as reference point nationally & strengthens network globally
* Goal: Create unique experience combining art, music, and nature, with a fresh perspective on post-internet culture
* Seeking sponsors who share our vision and help us achieve this goal.

Abstract: Ecosistemi aims to position itself as Italy's first festival dedicated to post-internet sub-cultures, bringing together avant-garde music, art, and natural ecosystems.

Mission: To build an inclusive, international, and digitally oriented offering of art and music that is attuned to emerging sub-cultures and new generations. To provide new-generation musicians with opportunities, engaging both established names and niches that share an internet-based aesthetic. To enhance the offering of forms of aggregation and artistic expression by bringing consumers closer to a vision of conscious use of natural spaces. To consolidate the initiative as a national reference point and strengthen the network on a European or international scale.

Pitch for Sponsors:
Ecosistemi is a unique festival that combines cutting-edge music, art, and the natural world to create a one-of-a-kind post-internet experience. Our mission is to build a community that celebrates diversity, creativity, and innovation. With your support, we can bring together talented musicians, artists, and nature lovers from all over the world to build a festival that truly stands out. By investing in Ecosistemi, you'll be supporting the growth of a cutting-edge community that is shaping the future of entertainment and culture.
